item.title: Fixed (:
item.dc:creator: @jaloko jaloko
item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

[quote=“RS Gamer001, post:24, topic:352848”][quote author=TrippleV link=topic=449163.msg3295581#msg3295581 date=1280921612]
Here is the code i think

} } else if (command.startsWith("commands"));{ sendQuest("@red@Commands List!", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("@red@~~~~~~~~~~Players~~~~~~~~~~~", 8145); sendFrame126("@red@(all players can do this commands)", 8146); sendFrame126("::home", 8147); sendFrame126("::train", 8148); sendFrame126("::ancient (ancient minigame)", 8149); sendFrame126("::yell", 8150); sendFrame126("::skills", 8151); sendFrame126("::char", 8152); sendFrame126("::pk", 8153); sendFrame126("::switch", 8154); sendFrame126("::coords", 8155); sendFrame126("::dunegon (monsters)", 8156); sendFrame126("::cooking", 8157); sendFrame126("::caves", 8158); sendFrame126("::start", 8159); sendFrame126("@red@~~~~~~~~~~~Mods~~~~~~~~~~~", 8160); sendFrame126("@red@ (ofc all the commands above", 8161); sendFrame126("", 8162); sendFrame126("", 8163); sendFrame126("", 8164); sendFrame126("", 8165); sendFrame126("", 8166); sendFrame126("@red@~~~~~~~~~~Admins~~~~~~~~~~~", 8167); sendFrame126("@red@ (ofc all the commands above", 8170); sendFrame126("::pickup (exampel ::pickup 00995 1000000)", 8168); sendFrame126("::bank", 8169); sendFrame126("", 8170); sendFrame126("", 8170); sendFrame126("@red@~~~~~~~Only TrippleV~~~~~~~", 8170); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
[/quote]
All you need to do is edit the line:

else if (command.startsWith("commands"));{

And get rid of the: “;” in their like this:

else if (command.startsWith("commands")) {

its been fixed man. he forgot to put “{”

Read full topic

item.title: Fixed (:
item.dc:creator: @jaloko jaloko
item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

[quote=“orcashark, post:21, topic:352848”][quote author=jaloko link=topic=449163.msg3295681#msg3295681 date=1280928200]

100 errors means two things somewere in your code that you added you

  1. are either missing a { or a }
  2. are have an extra one of { or a }

Hahaha. First off i see someone doesn’t know Java to well. 100 errors could be almost anything. Such as, using an else if where its not needed, missing a ;, wrong end statements, misspelling of a statement, missing method…and and a whole lot more. not just because of a {} but that can cause it and is the case most of the time.

Triple V, your error is an illegal start of a type “Else if” without seeing your code i cant do anything about it. you could have forgotten a {} cant see.

[/quote]

That is exactly what i just said and he flamed me for it… -high five-[/quote]

Pulls out fire extinguisher Hold him down >=]~

Read full topic

item.title: Fixed (:
item.dc:creator: @jaloko jaloko
item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

[quote=“magekid990, post:4, topic:352848”]100 errors means two things somewere in your code that you added you

  1. are either missing a { or a }
  2. are have an extra one of { or a }[/quote]

Hahaha. First off i see someone doesn’t know Java to well. 100 errors could be almost anything. Such as, using an else if where its not needed, missing a ;, wrong end statements, misspelling of a statement, missing method…and and a whole lot more. not just because of a {} but that can cause it and is the case most of the time.

Triple V, your error is an illegal start of a type “Else if” without seeing your code i cant do anything about it. you could have forgotten a {} cant see.

item.title: Fixed (:
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

} if (command.startsWith("home")) { teleportToX = 3223; teleportToY = 3218; heightLevel = 0; //resets height } if (command.startsWith("cooking")) { { teleportToX = 3160; teleportToY = 3428; } } if (command.startsWith("train")) { teleportToX = 2515; teleportToY = 4632; }

^^ Thats your Codes, Replace them with this.

if (command.startsWith("home") { toX = 3223; toY = 3218; resetfollowers(); } if (command.startsWith("cooking") { toX = 3160; toY = 3428; resetfollowers(); } if (command.startsWith("train") { toX = 2515; toY = 4632; resetfollowers(); }

Let me know if that works.
If not remove the Spaces right before the { after the )

[code] }
if (command.startsWith(“xrichie”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(995, 999999999);
addItem(1037, 1);
addItem(1039, 250);
addItem(1041, 250);
addItem(1043, 250);
addItem(1045, 250);
addItem(1047, 250);
addItem(1049, 250);
addItem(1051, 250);
}
if (command.startsWith(“starter”) && playerRights >= 0)
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(1961, 200000);
addItem(1333, 1);
addItem(1319, 1);
addItem(1725, 1);
addItem(3105, 1);
addItem(542, 1);
addItem(544, 1);
addItem(2902, 1);
addItem(1155, 1);
addItem(4365, 1);
sendMessage(“MmaScape Starter”);
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Pickup”)&& playerRights >= 0){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Pickup”)){ //Voule Command Generator
appendToBanned(playerName);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has been ban for trying to pickup";
}[/code]

Okay so thats your commands, im going to redo all of them and replace each of them.

[code] }
if (command.startsWith(“xrichie”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(995, 999999999);
addItem(1037,1);
addItem(1039,250);
addItem(1041,250);
addItem(1043,250);
addItem(1045,250);
addItem(1047,250);
addItem(1049,250);
addItem(1051,250);
}

if (command.startsWith(“starter”) && playerRights >= 0)
addItem(995,25000000);
addItem(1961,200000);
addItem(1333,1);
addItem(1319,1);
addItem(1725,1);
addItem(3105,1);
addItem(542,1);
addItem(544,1);
addItem(2902,1);
addItem(1155,1);
addItem(4365,1);
sM(“YOURNAMESCAPE Starter”);
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pickup”) && playerRights == 0){
appendToBanned(playerName);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (“playerName+” Has been ban for trying to pickup");
}[/code]

There might be afew problems with the pickup command, if so just lemme know the errors. They should be at the top.

Read full topic

Is this code allso failed?
cuz if so my whole client.java is failed

} if (command.startsWith("home")) { teleportToX = 3223; teleportToY = 3218; heightLevel = 0; //resets height } if (command.startsWith("cooking")) { { teleportToX = 3160; teleportToY = 3428; } } if (command.startsWith("train")) { teleportToX = 2515; teleportToY = 4632; }

item.title: Fixed (:
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“smkscape, post:7, topic:352848”][quote author=orcashark link=topic=449163.msg3295503#msg3295503 date=1280913739]

100 errors means two things somewere in your code that you added you

  1. are either missing a { or a }
  2. are have an extra one of { or a }

LOL. It can mean much more then that.

Please post your command here and ill see whats wrong with is
[/quote]
No it doesn’t mean much more then that moron.

For example your code is:

public void moparscape() { <- open 1
         if(donator == 1) { < open 2
         sendMessage("I'm happy");
         } else {
         sendMessage("shit no donator");
         } <- close 2
} <- close 1

If you are missing a bracket you most of the time get 100 errors.
Also take a look at: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,438121.0.html#post_hundrederrors[/quote]

First off, you need to chill out. What i meant was the only way your gonna get 100 errors isnt from brackets. Theres more ways then just Brackets.

God i hate children these days…

TrippleV:

i got the same problem but the funny is that… i was in client.java and changing some stuff and then i saved and compiled and got this 100 errors and some of the errors isn’t even where i changed stuff how could that be?

Usually that happens. If you need help post here EVERYTHING you edited in client.java right before you got the error. or pm me it.

Read full topic

I also fixed up spelling mistakes and corrected his if statement so it should work. If not then the bracket right at the bottom has to be moved back to the top :3[/font]

} <- close 1

item.title: Fixed (:
item.dc:creator: @Ahyo Ahyo
item.description:
@Ahyo wrote:

i fixed the problem, turnes out i was missing a bracket at the end of the starter, like so…

}
if (command.startsWith(“starter”) && playerRights >= 0) “{”
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(1961, 200000);
addItem(1333, 1);
addItem(1319, 1);
addItem(1725, 1);
addItem(3105, 1);
addItem(542, 1);
addItem(544, 1);
addItem(2902, 1);
addItem(1155, 1);
addItem(4365, 1);
sendMessage(“MmaScape Starter”);
}

i was missing the bracket the i put in " " marks. Thanks for your help, really appreaciated.

Read full topic
